Text.Name: Farm
Text.Desc: Farmlands in the mortal realm. Produces wheat.

Text.Name: Mine
Text.Desc: Mines in the mortal realm. Produces brownstone.

Text.Name: Lumber
Text.Desc: Logging camps in the mortal realm. Produces wood.

Text.Name: LingMine
Text.Desc: Spirit stone mines in the mortal realm. Produces spirit stones.

Text.Name: Statue
Text.Desc: The statue of a deity. Once constructed, if a Shendao disciple built the Temple of Miracles in the Divine Realm, you can appoint the disciple to be possessed here.

Text.Name: Arena
Text.Desc: Dojo. Once constructed, this place can be used for practice by disciples garrisoned here.
